summary: This document is a certification from Gregory R. Francis, the Lieutenant Governor of the Virgin Islands, regarding the amendment of the Articles of Organization for a company originally named LW EMPLOYEES, LLC, which has been changed to LSJE. The document confirms that the amendment was duly recorded and is in effect as of March 13, 2013.

persons.name: Gregory R. Francis
persons.context: Gregory R. Francis certifies the amendment of a company's name in the Virgin Islands.

events.title: Amendment of Company Name
events.description: LW EMPLOYEES, LLC changed its name to LSJE.

events.title: Certification of Amendment
events.description: Gregory R. Francis certifies the amendment of the company's name.

keyFacts: The document certifies the amendment of a company's name from LW EMPLOYEES, LLC to LSJE.
The amendment was filed on March 13, 2013.
The certification was issued by Gregory R. Francis, the Lieutenant Governor of the Virgin Islands.
